import React, { useState } from "react" import * as Components from './Components' import './login2.css' import {Link} from 'react-router-dom' function Login2({setToken}) { const [username, setUsername] = useState('') const [password, setPassword] = useState() const [email, setEmail] = useState() function handleUsername (e) { e.preventDefault() setUsername(e.target.value) } function handlePassword (e) { e.preventDefault() setPassword(e.target.value) } function handleEmail (e) { e.preventDefault() setEmail(e.target.value) } const handleSubmit = e => { e.preventDefault() const token = { username, password } setToken(token) } const [signIn, toggle] = React.useState(true); return(
Create Account Sign Up Sign in Forgot your password? Sign In Welcome Back! To keep connected with us please login with your personal info toggle(true)}> Sign In Hello, Friend! Enter Your personal details and start journey with us toggle(false)}> Sign Up
) } export default Login2
